alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 2:29AM CST until January 31 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 11 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one half of an inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of Middle Tennessee. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM CST this evening to 11 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Hickman; Humphreys; Lawrence; Lewis; Maury; Perry; Wayne; Williamson
